hero.title: Authentic Vietnamese Cuisine
hero.subtitle: Experience the rich flavors and traditions of Vietnam in the heart of Muehldorf

about.title: About Miss Hoian
about.subtitle: A Journey Through Vietnamese Culinary Heritage
about.description: Miss Hoian brings the authentic taste of Vietnam to Muehldorf. Our restaurant is named after the ancient town of Hoi An, a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its culinary excellence. We serve traditional Vietnamese dishes prepared with fresh ingredients and time-honored recipes passed down through generations.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.subtitle: Discover Authentic Vietnamese Flavors
menu.footer: All prices are in EUR. Please inform us of any allergies or dietary requirements.
